long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎥 Right-Click YT Thumbnail Downloader

📥 Instantly download YouTube video thumbnails with just a right-click!

Tired of searching for YouTube thumbnails? Now, you can grab them effortlessly! The Right-Click YT Thumbnail Downloader makes it super easy to download any YouTube video’s thumbnail directly from the video player.

✨ Key Features:

🖱️ Right-click to download any YouTube video thumbnail in seconds.
🚀 Quick & lightweight — fast, no-fuss thumbnail saving.
🎯 No extra steps — no need to navigate away from YouTube.
🔒 Privacy-focused — only accesses YouTube video pages for thumbnails.
How it works:

Install the extension.
Open any YouTube video 🎬.
Right-click anywhere on the webpage and select “Download Thumbnail” — done! 👍
